CLI Reference â€‹

All of these commands are available locally. ðŸŒŒ

For more information run:

reasonai help

Initialization â€‹

reasonai init

Run this command to initialize the local environment. Needed before any other commands can work

Parameters â€‹

None

Checking general status â€‹

reasonai status

Run this command to check the status of all Inference APIs and Reason Functions

Parameters â€‹

None

Pulling from remote â€‹

reasonai pull

Run this command to pull all Inference APIs and Reason Functions from remote

Parameters â€‹

None

Deploying all changes â€‹

reasonai pull

Run this command to deploy all Inference APIs and Reason Functions changes

Parameters â€‹

None



Inference APIs â€‹

Creating Inference API â€‹

reasonai api add

Run this command to initiate the wizard for adding an Inference API

Parameters â€‹

None

Deploying Inference API â€‹

reasonai api push

Run this command to push your local changes for Inference APIs

Parameters â€‹

None

Checking Inference API status â€‹

reasonai api status

Run this command to check the status of Inference APIs between local and remote

Parameters â€‹

None

Running Inference API â€‹

reasonai api run <name>

Run this command to run the Inference APIs with the given name

Parameters â€‹

name: Name of the Inference API to run



Reason Functions â€‹

Creating Reason Function â€‹

reasonai function add

Run this command to initiate the wizard for adding an Reason Function

Parameters â€‹

None

Deploying Reason Function â€‹

reasonai api push

Run this command to push your local changes for Reason Function

Parameters â€‹

None

Checking Reason Function status â€‹

reasonai api status

Run this command to check the status of Reason Functions between local and remote

Parameters â€‹

None



Authentication â€‹

Log in to Reason AI â€‹

reasonai login

Run this command to log in on the CLI with an API Key

Parameters â€‹

None

Log out of Reason AI â€‹

reasonai logout

Run this command to sign out on the CLI

Parameters â€‹

None

Check Auth status â€‹

reasonai whoami

Run this command to check login status

Parameters â€‹

None

Reset â€‹

reasonai reset

Run this command to completly remove the local environment

Parameters â€‹

None
